verses.verse: This is a <S%G4103>true<s%> <S%G3056>saying,<s%> If a <S%G1536>man<s%> <S%G3713>desire<s%> the office of a <S%G1984>bishop,<s%> he <S%G1937>desireth<s%> a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2041>work.<s%>

A <S%G1985>bishop<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G423>blameless,<s%> the <S%G435>husband<s%> of <S%G3391>one<s%> <S%G1135>wife,<s%> <S%G3524>vigilant,<s%> <S%G4998>sober,<s%> of good <S%G2887>behavior,<s%> given to <S%G5382>hospitality,<s%> apt to <S%G1317>teach;<s%>

Not <S%G3361><s%> given to <S%G3943>wine,<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G4131>striker,<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> greedy of filthy <S%G146>lucre;<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1933>patient,<s%> not a <S%G269>brawler,<s%> not <S%G866>covetous;<s%>

(For <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> how to <S%G4291>rule<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G3624>house,<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> shall he take care <S%G1959>of<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%> of <S%G2316>God?)<s%>

Not <S%G3361><s%> a <S%G3504>novice,<s%> <S%G3363>lest<s%> being lifted up with <S%G5187>pride<s%> he <S%G1706>fall<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2917>condemnation<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1228>devil.<s%>

Moreover <S%G1161><s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G3141>report<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> them which are <S%G1855>without;<s%> <S%G3363>lest<s%> he <S%G1706>fall<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3680>reproach<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3803>snare<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1228>devil.<s%>

Likewise <S%G5615><s%> must the <S%G1249>deacons<s%> be <S%G4586>grave,<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1351>doubletongued,<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G4337>given<s%> to <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3631>wine,<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> greedy of filthy <S%G146>lucre;<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> let <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G1161>also<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> be <S%G1381>proved;<s%> <S%G1534>then<s%> let them use the office of a <S%G1247>deacon,<s%> <S%G5607>being<s%> found <S%G410>blameless.<s%>

Let the <S%G1249>deacons<s%> <S%G2077>be<s%> the <S%G435>husbands<s%> of <S%G3391>one<s%> <S%G1135>wife,<s%> <S%G4291>ruling<s%> their <S%G5043>children<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> their <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G3624>houses<s%> <S%G2573>well.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> they that have used the office of a <S%G1247>deacon<s%> <S%G2573>well<s%> <S%G4046>purchase<s%> to <S%G1438>themselves<s%> a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G898>degree,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3954>boldness<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> I tarry <S%G1019>long,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> thou mayest <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> thou <S%G1163>oughtest<s%> to behave <S%G390>thyself<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%> of the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> the <S%G4769>pillar<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1477>ground<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G225>truth.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> without <S%G3672>controversy<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3466>mystery<s%> of <S%G2150>godliness:<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> was <S%G5319>manifest<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> <S%G3700>seen<s%> of <S%G32>angels,<s%> <S%G2784>preached<s%> <S%G1722>unto<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> believed <S%G4100>on<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2889>world,<s%> received <S%G353>up<s%> <S%G1722>into<s%> <S%G1391>glory.<s%>
